description: This file defines a pytest fixture `temp_dir` that creates and cleans up a temporary directory for testing purposes. It handles cleanup with additional robustness to work in environments like GitHub Actions, where permission issues or file locking might occur.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: A pytest fixture that creates a temporary directory, yields its path, and ensures cleanup with retries to handle permission or locking issues, especially in CI environments.
